ygData.subject: Re: Pod Lands Megatron's home
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron, Rampage, and Marine stepped out and followed Scorpinox. Tell me agian what were doing exactly, scorpinox? I dont like surprizes. The Energonian

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Megatron, Rampage, and Marine stepped out and followed Scorpinox. 
"Tell me agian what were doing exactly, scorpinox? I dont like surprizes."

       The Energonian shuttle broke off into three small peices. The two side 
wings went starboard and the cental continued onward. Within the central 
section of the ship was Ominous Prime, Quasar, and Putnam. The two wings 
contained Venus and Akron.
       "Wings, you fire full on the Ark, try to take as much energy out of it 
as possible. This vessle will cover you, and take out some of the ground 
work." Ominous commanded from the small, small cockpit.
       All three sections then raced across the moon, sending three blue 
energon trails of exhaust behinde them. Then, on the scanners as well as on 
the view screen came the sight of the Ark, and those fighting for it.
       Ominous' blue optics narrowed. Time to prove how powerful the 
Energonians really were. He sent the command to power up the energon turrets. 

       Tarantulas looked over to Black Aracnia and Quickstrike. They had 
found out about what was going on by the Ark, and they wanted to go.
       "Listen, Quasars there and I might have a chance to get her back. 
Besides, Quickstrike and I are small enough to go realativly unnoticed. We 
could be in and out aot quicker than your big transmetal 2 body."
       Black Aracnia told him very matter of factly. Tarantulas really didnt 
have an option. He nodded and then told them to help him with the last 
touches for the vessle.

--part1_33.1062860b.27b2f0c1_boundary
